mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification ( user_id, item_id, content, is_read, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{itemId}, #{content}, 'N', SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.content, n.is_read, u.nickname, n.item_id, i.title, (SELECT image_url FROM ( SELECT image_url FROM item_image WHERE item_id = i.id ORDER BY id ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) AS image_url FROM notification n LEFT JOIN "user" u ON n.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN item i ON n.item_id = i.id WHERE n.user_id = #{userId} AND n.is_read = 'N' ORDER BY n.created_at DESC
